name: GNU Freetalk
tagline: Console based messenger for Facebook, Jabber and XMPP based services.
body:
Freetalk
============

Freetalk is command line

- Its goodness
- Its richness
- Its flexibility
- Its power

Freetalk is functional()

- The language which we loved so much
- The language which showed us utopia
- The language which made us feel human

Freetalk is freedom!, the freedom which we all cherish

- To be able to avoid the cages of webui
- To be able to avoid the Gnome GTK (Exceptions)
- To be able to experience beauty in minimalism

The most of all Freetalk is a friend

- A friend you can trust
- A friend who listens
- A friend who lets you be who you are

There is comprehensive documentation in Info format in the doc/ directory,
which you should be able to read by saying,

       $ info freetalk

Queries
--------
If you face any problems compiling or using Freetalk, or if you have
any feedback/developer questions, feel free to open [Freetalk issues](https://github.com/GNUFreetalk/freetalk/issues)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
